Pooja Bose Height | Biography | Wiki | Husband | Family | Age

Bolly Reporter
10 months ago

Pooja Bose (পূজা বোস) is an Indian actress. She mainly works in Bengali Movies, Bollywood Movies, and Hindi TV Series & reality shows. She is become one of the most popular tv actresses of India after appearing in the television serial ‘Tujh Sang Preet Lagai Sajna‘.

Biography & Wiki

Pooja Bose’s real name is Puja Banerjee. She was born on born on 6 February 1987 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. Hence, her current age is 33 years. Pooja’s Zodiac is Aquarius.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Pooja is coming from a very strict Bengali family and her family members did not support her for acting career.

Education and School, College

Pooja did her schooling from St Pauls Mission School, Kolkata. After that, she went to Scottish Church College, Kolkata to complete her graduation.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Puja Banerjee was married Arnoy Chakraborty at her young age but the couple got divorced. Pooja is currently engaged to her co-star Kunal Verma.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

Pooja Bose filmography

Pooja started acting when she was just 15 years old. She is well known for playing Vrinda in the popular show Tujh Sang Preet Lagai Sajna, which was broadcast from Star Plus. She made her tv debut with “Kahaani Hamaaray Mahaabhaarat Ki” in 2008. In movies, she made her debut with Telugu movie with Veedu Theda. She made her debut in the Bengali film Macho Mustanaa, with Hiran Chatterjee.

She played a lead role in Raja Chanda’s film Challenge 2, starring Dev Adhikari and Sujit Mondal’s film Rocky. Pooja Bose Acted Few Bollywood Films her First Hindi Film Great Grand Masti in 2016 which is Very Popular in Bollywood Box office. Pooja Bose also participated in Jhalak Dikhlaa Ja season 7 in 2014.

Pooja Bose some Notable films are Great Grand Masti, Rocky, Loveria, Teen Patti and Bhalobasa Bhalobasa 2. Pooja was also a participant in the reality dance show Jhalak Dikhla Jaa 7 as well as on Comedy Nights Bachao telecast on Colors. Her future acting offers include a negative role as a witch in Zee TV’s Qubool Hai.

Salary and Net Worth

Pooja has an estimated net worth of almost $3 Million. She earns almost ₹15 1o ₹20 lakhs for every movie she plays as salary.

Contact Address

Facts about Pooja Bose

  • Pooja replaced actress Sonika Bhadoria to play the role of Parvati in the famous television series Devon Ke Dev Mahadev.
  • She paired with comedian Naseem Vicky in the comedy show Comedy Nights Bachao in the year 2015.
  • When she was 15 years old, she played the role of Baban in the Hindi film Escape from Taliban.
  • Her kissing photo with actress Sara Khan was leaked publicly.
